channel.title: Free on Leopoldo Caballero
channel.description: Recent content in Free on Leopoldo Caballero

item.title: Moving this site to gh-pages with SSL for free
item.description: This site was hosted in a VPS with 128 MB of RAM, and 10GB of disk space. So far, so good. These specs are sufficient enough for run a hugo server, a nginx reverse proxy. And with Let’s Encrypt all is served with SSL. Everything is smooth with this configuration, but in a near future (next month) the plan with the VPS is over, and there is not possible to extend the contract because the provider was acquired by a third and the product was outdated.
